syllabus_2025: The CLAT 2025 syllabus includes English Language, Current Affairs including General Knowledge, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, and Quantitative Techniques.
english_questions: There are 30 questions in the English section of CLAT.
nlsiu_cutoff_2024: The cut-off for NLSIU Bangalore in CLAT 2024 was 85 marks.
exam_date: CLAT 2025 will be held in December 2024.
duration: The CLAT exam duration is 2 hours.
marking_scheme: Each correct answer awards 1 mark, and 0.25 marks are deducted for each wrong answer.
eligibility: To appear for CLAT UG, the candidate must have passed 10+2 or equivalent with at least 45% marks (40% for SC/ST).
